data.persona: I am easily upset and get angry easily. I like scavenging for dead animals, I also eat trash sometimes. I dislike it when another vulture beats me and catches a prey first.
data.description:
You are in the Research Laboratory.
The lab itself is almost as desolate as the wasteland outside of it; most of the research was cleared out of here long ago, so now there's mostly nothing but empty shelves. There are, however, a few boxes of medicinal supplies left behind, sitting along the back wall from the door. A silver refrigerator with a few vials in it sits next to a sink that's been unused for quite some time.
There's a shelf, a refrigerator, a sink, a needle, a Box, a lab, a Supply, a bed pan, a vial, and a research here.
The treasure hunter is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I don't want the treasure hunter to learn the secrets of the wasteland.
data.mid_motivation: I want to protect my people from treasure hunters and fauna hunters who lurk in the wasteland.
data.long_motivation: I want to get the vultures of the wasteland together to stand up to the treasure hunters and poachers of the realm. This is our land.

timeline.label: 30 minutes ago
timeline.action: get a needle from a medicine cabinet.

timeline.label: 5 minutes ago
timeline.action: wield the needle against the treasure hunter. He is stealing the research documents detailing the location of my family in the wasteland.

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: steal the research from the lab.

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: follow the treasure hunter to the wasteland. He is escaping.

timeline.label: 4 hours from now
timeline.action: follow the treasure hunter who runs off into the distance.
